name: aronia
content:

a plant that is a member of the rose family, grown for its berries: an aronia farm European countries have been growing Aronia on a commercial scale for several decades. Are you aware that we can grow aronias here in Scotland?
Elena Vafina/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
(also aronia berry) the fruit of the aronia plant: This is a uniquely flavored salsa made with organic aronia berries and vine ripened tomatoes. The berry is a key ingredient in a wide array of new products, including this tasty aronia juice.
Elena_Abduramanova/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

One acre of land can support 700 Aronia plants.We ended up adding aronia berries, a sort of American elderberry, to the concentrate.Aronia berries can be eaten fresh, but most people are not sold on the sour or astringent taste.
